scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist/node_modules && del dist /q &&  npm run tsc && del dist\test.js
scripts.build: copy package.json dist /y && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev && echo please run the node-prune command before packing && start /b /wait wsl --cd D:/pam/share/dist && cd ..
scripts.postbuild: cd dist && wsl --shell-type standard -e zip -r deployment_pack.zip . && copy deployment_pack.zip ../deployment_pack.zip && del deployment_pack.zip && cd ..
